title: Text Utils
description: This project is created using react js. It has multiple functionality for text editing according to user. It has both light and dark mode

title: News Website
description: This project is created using react js where the data is fetched from the API and user can also read the news based on category like sport, entertainment

title: Note
description: This is full stack project using MERN where user can create, read, update and delete the notes

title: Vehile speed detection
description: This is a opencv project where we are using harcascade algorithm to get the vehicle and find speed of the vehicle
